name: Delicious Word Bubble – learn new English Words
name_original: Delicious Word Bubble – learn new English Words
description:
Delicious Word Bubble is an addictive bubble shooter game for Android that not only delivers hours of fun and excitement but it also helps to learn basic English words and improve vocabulary. Keep on reading to see how this classic arcade game is going to become the best educational and entertaining game.

So, if you are looking for a fun game that also focuses on teaching new things , download Delicious Word Bubble for free on your Android device and see how many bubbles can manage to blast and destroy, and how many levels they can manage to clear.

Delicious Word Bubble main features at a glance:
• Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
• High-quality graphics with smooth animations
• Learn new English words and improve your vocabulary skills
• Addictive bubble shooter game
• Easy to learn gameplay with endless challenges
• Fun arcade game for all
• Free to play
